scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm --filter backend dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.start: pnpm --filter backend start && pnpm --filter frontend start
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter backend lint:fix && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter backend format && pnpm --filter frontend format
scripts.format:check: pnpm --filter backend format:check && pnpm --filter frontend format:check
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter backend typecheck && pnpm --filter frontend typecheck
